entities.description: Use of something else to get over or avoid marijuana withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of cocaine or crack in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time trying to get or get cocaine in the past 12 months.
Used cocaine in larger amounts or for a longer time than intended in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used something else to get over or avoid marijuana withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent spent a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of cocaine or crack in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent spent a great deal of time trying to get or get cocaine in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used cocaine in larger amounts or for a longer time than intended in the past 12 months.
